lines.text: This... all relies on the Stop Wizard actually being... that.
What if it really is just a creepy wizard statue? What if my idea was totally wack?
A what-if isn't gonna put nails in any coffins, kid.
Coffins. L-lovely. We've given up on pretending to be pr-professional about this ''internal investigation''.
It's a figure of speech, Whydah.
